headline: William Blair Maintains Bullish Stance on DexCom (DXCM) Stock
summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) is one of the Best Long Term Growth Stocks to Buy Now. On September 19, William Blair analyst Brandon Vazquez maintained their bullish stance on the company’s stock, giving a “Buy” rating. The analyst’s rating is backed by a combination of factors demonstrating its growth potential despite current concerns. The analyst noted that the MAUDE database, which […]
